name: Safeguard
effect: Screen Move. The User and Allies are immune to Status Ailments. Previously inflicted Status Ailments remain. If 3 or more Statuses are prevented by Safeguard, reduce the remaining duration of Safeguard by 1 (this effect only triggers once per Round). Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokemon creates an energy shield that protects everyone from harm.
